mapper.select: SELECT i.CDBH, i.CDBM, i.CDMC, i.CDURL, i.SJCDBH, o.cdmc as SJCDMC, i.CDSXH, i.CDTP, i.SFXDLJ, i.CDDKCKSZWZ, i.CDZXKJBH, i.CDSFKY, i.CDSFKJ, i.CDDKFS, i.CDLX FROM PF_RESMENU i left join PF_RESMENU o on i.sjcdbh = o.cdbh WHERE i.CDBH = #{VALUE,jdbcType=CHAR}
SELECT * FROM PF_RESMENU WHERE SJCDBH = #{VALUE} order by cdsxh asc
SELECT * FROM PF_RESMENU WHERE SJCDBH = 'DEFAULT_MENUTREE_ROOT' order by cdsxh asc
mapper.insert: insert into PF_RESMENU (CDBH, CDBM, CDMC, CDURL, SJCDBH, CDSXH, CDTP, SFXDLJ, CDDKCKSZWZ, CDZXKJBH, CDSFKY, CDSFKJ, CDDKFS, CDLX) values (#{cdbh,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cdbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sjcdbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdsxh,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cdtp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sfxdlj,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cddkckszwz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdzxkjbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdsfky,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cdsfkj,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cddkfs,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cdlx,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select menu.*,resurl.urlbh cdurlbh from (select * from PF_RESMENU where cdbh in (select sqzybm from PF_ARCGRANT arc where jlzt = #{jlzt} AND sqzylx = 'CD' and sqdxbh = #{sqdxbh}) ) menu left join PF_RESURL resurl on menu.cdurl = resurl.urllj ORDER BY menu.cdsxh,menu.cdmc --START WITH menu.SJCDBH = 'DEFAULT_MENUTREE_ROOT' CONNECT BY PRIOR menu.CDBH = menu.SJCDBH ORDER SIBLINGS BY menu.CDSXH ASC

select menu.*,resurl.urlbh cdurlbh from (select * from PF_RESMENU where cdbh in (select sqzybm from PF_ARCGRANT arc where jlzt = #{jlzt} AND sqzylx = #{sqzylx} and sqdxbh = #{sqdxbh})) menu left join PF_RESURL resurl on menu.cdurl = resurl.urllj where cdbh in (select sjcdbh from PF_RESMENU)

select menu.*,resurl.urlbh cdurlbh from (select * from PF_RESMENU where cdbh in (select sqzybm from PF_ARCGRANT arc where jlzt = #{jlzt} AND sqzylx = #{sqzylx} and sqdxbh = #{sqdxbh})) menu left join PF_RESURL resurl on menu.cdurl = resurl.urllj where cdbh NOT IN (select sjcdbh from PF_RESMENU)
